ratings.comment: Dr. Duello is invaluable for premed advising once you have taken her course. She is honest & a true straight-shooter. The exams consist of essay questions, be sure to get your info directly from the slides & be exhaustive in your answer. Check the syllabus to be sure you don't miss assignments because they are easy to forget!

Dr. Duello is a great professor who not only gave interesting lectures, but also cared about each student. She gave optional questions in final that were from midterm, and we were able to regain the points lost in the midterm if we got them right in the final. She also offered great help in finding research and shadowing opportunities.

Duello was ok. Incredibly helpful outside of class and is a great resource to have. At the same time, lecture and tests were just regurgitating what she wanted us to say (no matter how much she insists otherwise). I didn't really like the class and found it boring, but I recommend taking it. You get a great CV and Duello is a good Resource + easy A
Extremely helpful inside and outside of class. She took an interest in every individual student.

Extremely helpful in class and for life.  One of the only professor's at Madison who actually takes the time to know you and help you!! Offers future help when applying to graduate school and really cares about what you take away from the course, more focused on life context and life skills than what is written in a book.  Make sure to go to class.
